last_episode_to_air.name: Taking On All Comers! Love, Fists, And Best Bros
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Hinako Nakayama took on the identity of Hikaru Onigashima, she didn't know what it would mean for her future. Now, with the support of the friends she's made with her martial arts skills, it's time to prove who's the boss of Shishiku Academy!

name: Kenka Banchou Otome: Girl Beats Boys
original_name: 喧嘩番長 乙女-Girl Beats Boys-

episodes.name: One Fist
episodes.overview: Hinako Nakayama is an orphan and a martial arts expert, who was living her life in a fuzzy haze when she finds herself attending a new school. While the new outlook she gets from her new surroundings is great, there's a few problems: 1) Its an all-boys school 2) Its student body is nearly 100% punks who are ready to brawl at a moment's notice and 3) She's attending under an assumed identity that ensures the toughest are all going to be gunning for her!

episodes.name: The Road to Conquering Shishiku
episodes.overview: Hinako is now cross-dressing in order to attend the extremely roughneck Shishiku Academy as Hikaru Onigashima. How exactly did she get into this mess?

episodes.name: The Supremely Stoic Punk
episodes.overview: Hinako reaches the next hurdle in her quest to take over Shishiku Academy: Takayuki Konparu. The only problem? The steely first-year has no interest in fighting her!

episodes.name: Fight In the Rain
episodes.overview: Konparu has sent a letter of challenge to Hinako and is now out for her blood. Why is he suddenly ready to fight her? And can Hinako win the fight when she learns the truth?

episodes.name: Show 'Em What You're Made Of! The Great Study Session
episodes.overview: With her control over the first-years secured Konparu and Totomaru head to Hinako's house for a study session to prepare for mid-terms.

episodes.name: The Idol Punk Arrives!
episodes.overview: One of the two top second-years, Yuta Mirako, is both an idol and a brawler. An upcoming concert at Shishiku Academy brings him into conflict with Hinako.

episodes.name: Concert Brawl
episodes.overview: Mirako's disgust at the concept of friendship has Hinako curious, and after hearing about his troubled past from Kira, she decides to help him.

episodes.name: Alas! Such Kind Fists...
episodes.overview: The other top second-year student, Rintarou Kira, seems to know Hinako's real identity. How does he know, and what will it mean for her conquest of Shishiku Academy?

episodes.name: Passionate Feelings, Determined Fists...
episodes.overview: Hinako is unsure what to do now that she remembers who Kira is. Will Hinako continue her attempt to take the school over?

episodes.name: Beyond Our Feelings
episodes.overview: Kira seems to know who Hinako really is, and wants her to give up her conquest of the school. It seems the only way for her to convince him otherwise is to fight him... and win.

episodes.name: The Witch Trial Begins
episodes.overview: Rumors are starting to spread about Hinako's true identity, and if something isn't done soon to quiet them, she risks her own school turning against her. Luckily, she can still rely on her friends.

episodes.name: Taking On All Comers! Love, Fists, And Best Bros
episodes.overview: When Hinako Nakayama took on the identity of Hikaru Onigashima, she didn't know what it would mean for her future. Now, with the support of the friends she's made with her martial arts skills, it's time to prove who's the boss of Shishiku Academy!
